alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 17 at 7:46PM CDT until September 17 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN OTTAWA COUNTY... At 745 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Culver, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 744 PM, Spotters in Culver reported 60 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball sized hail. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Bennington, Tescott, Culver and Niles. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail and damaging winds. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
